ygData.subject: Re: Verant Email text
ygData.msgSnippet: On ballance...anybody can ballance a game that olny gives you THREE options for race/class! I think that Verant has done a pretty good job of ballancing...they
ygData.messageBody:
On ballance...anybody can ballance a game that olny gives you THREE options
for race/class!
I think that Verant has done a pretty good job of ballancing...they just
need to continue with MINOR tweaking as time goes on to maintain the
ballance.
Just my hyumble opinion :)'
Seran

-----Original Message-----
From: Tyson Schoepflin [mailto:schoty@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 1:17 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Verant Email text


From: "Tyson Schoepflin" <schoty@...>

Venlaan 21st Wizard,

Finally pulled out he old bang, fizzle, RUN! Char last night. Was in
highpass and tried to take a green gnoll. Actually hit him for 171(Was
shocked at this). Then enstill didn't work and I got the crap beat out of
me, but zoned in time. After regen I headed back in. There was a 20th lvl
ranger. ( I know it's a hybrid class.) She took out three blues (Blues to
me) without a resting period. And I questioned our "power" as wizards.

One thing I have noticed in Blizzard games. (Don't get me wrong here) is
they spent enough time before release finding BALANCE in a game. Yeah they
had a ton a problems with cheating but the underlying BALANCE was there.
Everquest can be a GREAT game if they can work these out. If you have
noticed the patches flying around they totally deal with balace in the game.
Perhpas they should look at the wizard class to see if there is any balance
there at all.
